EmailTemplate.name: PS GSL1 PRM-Request Update for Partner User Relationship Type - No longer in Par
EmailTemplate.subject: PRM-Request Update for Partner User Relationship Type - No longer in Partner Role : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PS_Stakeholder__c},
Please process the following Partner-related request based on the details below:
PRM-Request Update for Partner User Relationship Type - No longer in Partner Role
Partner Account Name
{!Case.Account}
ALCR ID / 1*
SAP ID / 2*
Account ID / 3*
User Name
User Email
Federation ID of the User
User Status
Additional Notes
Once completed, please revert with the confirmation.
If additional information is needed, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
